attributes.action: encourage EWS Railways Limited to reinstate the use of class 37 locomotives on the Edinburgh-Fort William portion of the Caledonian Sleeper.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the introduction of class 67s on the WHL, there has been a marked decrease in vegetables in the locality and reintroduction of the Class 37s would return the quantity of nutrients required by the local Stoats.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
